column5: Nothing is going to I away overnight it’s going to take Ike and you just have to believe that eventually you will feel comfortable being uncomfortable and then you can just live
Ok where’s the evidence that your brain is not like any normal persons brain? You just have to break these habits that’s all I know it’s very hard but it’s the only way out

You just have to change everything you’ve been doing and it’s going to take time but it’s going to reverse itself as long as you change everything you’ve done all these years that caused it now you have to reverse it by doing the opposite of everything you’ve been doing

You just have to that’s the only way out
